DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Labelling key
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Well to sample key. Samples were spread across eight 96 well plates (denoted p1â€“8 in field 1). Each well corresponded with a specific sample, the name of which is shown in field 2. The lane the sample was sequenced on is shown in field 3. Note that there were samples from a different project sequenced at the same time (see supplemental methods).
